javax.xml.ws.http
Interface HTTPBinding

All Superinterfaces:
Binding
public interface HTTPBinding
extends Binding

The HTTPBinding interface is an abstraction for the XML/HTTP binding.

Since:
JAX-WS 2.0

Field Summary
static String HTTP_BINDING
          A constant representing the identity of the XML/HTTP binding.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface javax.xml.ws.Binding
getBindingID, getHandlerChain, setHandlerChain
